if.if: p.promo_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR p.promo_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR m.mem_id LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR m.mem_nick LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM promo_board p JOIN member m ON p.mem_num=m.mem_num

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT p.promo_num, p.promo_status,
REPLACE(REPLACE(p.promo_title,'<','&lt'),'>','>') promo_title,
p.promo_hit, p.promo_fixed, p.promo_filename, p.promo_regdate, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM promo_reply r WHERE r.promo_num=p.promo_num) p_replyCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM promo_fav w WHERE w.promo_num=p.promo_num) p_favCnt, m.mem_num, m.mem_nick FROM promo_board p JOIN member m ON m.mem_num=p.mem_num
ORDER BY p.promo_regdate DESC
ORDER BY p.promo_hit DESC
ORDER BY p_favCnt DESC, p.promo_hit DESC
ORDER BY p_replyCnt DESC, p.promo_hit DESC
)a)
WHERE rnum>=#{start} AND rnum<=#{end}

REPLACE(REPLACE(pre_content,'<','<'),'>','>') pre_content,
